backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with all platform data types, storage maps, authorization mixins, and activity logging for users, news, jobs, media, notifications, settings, and voting results.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration module that adds an empty votingResults map when converting old actor state to the new format.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Includes prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based CSS variables for colors, themes, and base styles including light and dark mode palettes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML template that loads the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry component handling hash routing, system decommission check, and conditional rendering of all pages with error boundary.
frontend/src/assets/generatedAssets.ts: Exports static asset paths for logo, hero background, and login background images.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Renders an access denied card for unauthorized admin access with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAuthE: Displays an admin authentication error with retry and navigation options.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminModul: Renders different admin module views based on the active module key.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Guards admin routes by checking identity and admin status, showing loaders, errors, or access denied as needed.
frontend/src/components/admin/common/Adm: Reusable searchable data table component with configurable columns and empty state.
frontend/src/components/admin/common/Del: Confirmation dialog for delete actions with loading state support.
frontend/src/components/admin/common/For: Displays a small inline error message with an icon.
frontend/src/components/admin/jobs/JobFo: Form for creating or updating job postings with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/jobs/JobsL: Lists job postings with search, status display, edit and delete actions, and delete confirmation.
frontend/src/components/admin/media/Medi: Displays uploaded media with search, type filtering, previewing, and deletion.
Dialog to preview or download image and PDF media files.
Provides a file upload UI with validation, progress display, and integration with the media upload mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Ba: Displays backup download options and tabs for viewing activity logs and login history.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Da: Shows dashboard metrics and recent activity with refresh support and activity type labeling.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Jo: Manages job listings with a list view and dialog for creating or editing jobs.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Me: Displays the media library with upload controls and a list of stored media.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Ne: Manages news articles with list view and dialog-driven creation and editing.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/No: Provides tabs for composing notifications and viewing notification history.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Re: Shows analytics and reporting features through a reports dashboard.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Sc: Manages government schemes with listing and dialog-based create/edit functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Us: Manages users with list, create/edit dialog, and user details drawer.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Vo: Handles listing and editing of village voting results with a form dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/We: Displays and edits website settings with logo picker integration and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/admin/news/Featu: Dialog for selecting a featured image by browsing, searching, and choosing from uploaded media.
frontend/src/components/admin/news/NewsF: Form component for creating and editing news articles with validation, image selection, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/news/NewsL: Displays a searchable list of news articles with edit, publish, and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/notificati: Provides a form to compose and send notifications to all users or selected recipients with validation.
Shows a history of sent notifications with timestamps, recipients count, and delivery status.
frontend/src/components/admin/reports/Re: Dashboard showing user and news statistics with CSV export options for users and news data.
frontend/src/components/admin/schemes/Do: Dialog for searching and selecting PDF or document media items with temporary selection state.
frontend/src/components/admin/schemes/Sc: Form component to create or update a scheme with validation, document selection, and mutation handling.
Displays a searchable table of schemes with edit and delete actions and a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/security/A: Shows a table of all admin activity logs with timestamps, principals, types, and details.
frontend/src/components/admin/security/B: Provides a button to trigger full system data export with loading feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/security/L: Lists login and logout activities filtered from admin activity logs.
frontend/src/components/admin/settings/L: Dialog for selecting an image from media to set as the website logo and saving updated settings.
frontend/src/components/admin/settings/W: Form for editing website settings including name, tagline, contact, SEO fields, and logo selection trigger.
frontend/src/components/admin/users/User: Drawer showing detailed user info with role assignment, status, and an edit action.
Dialog component for creating or editing users with form validation and create/update mutations.
Displays a searchable list of users with actions for viewing, editing, toggling status, and deleting.
frontend/src/components/admin/voting-res: Form dialog for adding or editing voting results with input validation and create/update mutations.
Shows all voting results with search, delete, and edit options, including loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: Error boundary that catches application errors and shows a reload prompt with optional error details.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginFooter: Footer with simple About, Privacy Policy, and Contact buttons plus a copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/auth/MemberLogin: Member login UI allowing mobile or password login with OTP request and navigation callback.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Main dashboard layout managing navbar, sidebar, responsive behavior, and routing between user and admin views.
Renders the user dashboard home with welcome text, profile progress, overview cards, and recent activities.
Top navigation bar with search, notifications, user menu, and logout handling with admin/user mode support.
Right-hand sidebar showing quick links and announcements with priority badges.
Sidebar navigation listing user or admin menu items with mobile toggle and active-state handling.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: Notification button showing unread count badge and opening the notification panel.
Slide-in panel showing user notifications with read/unread handling and mark-all-as-read support.
Error boundary that suppresses errors in the notification panel and renders nothing on failure.
frontend/src/components/site/BrandLogo.t: Renders a logo image with size options and a styled fallback if loading fails.
frontend/src/components/site/ComingSoonR: Displays a styled announcement ribbon indicating upcoming voting results.
frontend/src/components/site/LiveVotingR: Fetches and displays live voting results with loading, error, and empty states.
Builds the site footer with branding, support email, copyright, and attribution.
Provides the main page layout wrapping content with a footer.
frontend/src/components/site/TextLogo.ts: Renders a stylized text-based logo with size and color variants.
frontend/src/components/site/VotingPromo: Shows a promo section highlighting live voting results and includes the results widget.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/dashboard.ts: React Query hooks for fetching dashboard metrics, recent activity, and monthly growth.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/jobs.ts: CRUD hooks for managing job listings using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/media.ts: Hooks for listing, uploading (with progress), and deleting media items.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/news.ts: Provides hooks to list, create, update, publish, and delete news items.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/notifications.t: Handles creating notifications and retrieving notification history.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/schemes.ts: CRUD hooks for government schemes including creation, update, and deletion.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/security.ts: Fetches admin activity logs and provides a backup export utility.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/settings.ts: Hooks for fetching and updating global website settings.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminAuth.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch caller role and admin status from the actor with loading state merging.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/users.ts: Defines hooks for querying and mutating user data including fetch, create, update, delete, status updates, and role assignments.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/votingResults.t: Provides hooks to fetch and manage voting results, including create, update, and delete operations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/notifications.ts: Implements hooks to fetch a user's notifications and mark notifications as read using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useExampleNotificatio: Empty placeholder file for future notification hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider for login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing for future query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSystemStatus.ts: Checks if the backend is decommissioned by attempting a minimal read call and interpreting errors.
frontend/src/hooks/votingResults.ts: Fetches voting results with polling support for live updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, dark mode values, and utility classes including glassmorphism styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React Query, Internet Identity, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Wraps the admin dashboard layout with an admin route guard and navigation handling.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Admin login page using Internet Identity, handling login flow, errors, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/DecommissionedPage.ts: Displays a centered card informing users that the website is permanently decommissioned.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main homepage with hero section, notifications, navigation buttons, and category highlights.
frontend/src/pages/MemberLoginPage.tsx: Shows the member login screen with background image handling and login card UI.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboardPage.tsx: Wraps the user dashboard layout and passes navigation props.
frontend/src/utils/adminAuthError.ts: Provides helpers to normalize and detect admin authorization-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/hashRouting.ts: Implements hash-based routing utilities to parse, convert, and update page routes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash query support.
frontend/src/utils/userRole.ts: Contains helpers to check admin roles and convert user roles to readable labels.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, and pending requests for homepage voting features.
